name: Puppy Luv: Your New Best Friend
name_original: Puppy Luv: Your New Best Friend
description:
Puppy Luv is full of perfect pets! There's no need to run outside in the rain to take them out, they won't break anything, or even leave you a little surprise.

Features

• Play fetch and catch wtih them!
• Train them to jump, roll over, heel, beg and more!
• Have your pooch compete in dog shows!
• Super interactive Wii Remote dog controls
• Labs, Golden Retrievers, Beagles, Dalmatians & more
• 1000s of outfits to choose from
• Awesome toys for your puppy
